snippet.title: Alpha Polaris - Trailer
snippet.description: Trailer for Alpha Polaris, a mystery adventure game for PC. We're now on Steam Greenlight, vote for us at http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=500941835
